title: Mobileye to acquire humanoid robotics startup Mentee for $900 million
description: Mobileye Global on Tuesday said it would acquire humanoid robotics startup Mentee Robotics for about $900 million, as the Israeli self-driving technology firm bets on what it sees as the next frontier of artificial intelligence.
content:
The deal highlights the overlap between autonomous driving and robotics, where similar sensing, perception and decision-making technologies underpin the emerging field of embodied AI.

title: AI river forecasts may be accurate, but based on flawed logic
